productList.title: Continental GrandPrix 5000 Tubeless Bike Tyre 28x1,25" black (2019)
productList.description: How to do something even better: the Grand Prix 5000 from ContinentalContinental was faced with the difficult task of developing a worthy successor for the Grand Prix 4000 S II - for the tire that continues to dominate the performance tests. The challenge was to top it off with rolling resistance, high mileage, speed and puncture protection. It was necessary to top it all off with rolling resistance, high mileage, speed and puncture protection.The developers at Continental have put one special person at the center of these considerations - you. It is simply your time that you spend on the bike. Whether it's for training or competition. Be it in the rain or in the sun, cold or warm. Be it to set a new best time or simply to switch off on the house round.The best all-rounder in the field on a completely new performance level. Drive faster, more comfortably and even more puncture-proof. Made to make you better. For fans of tubeless driving, Conti offers the Grand Prix 5000 in a tubeless version. The Grand Prix features an advanced BlackChili compound for lowest rolling resistance, high mileage and maximum wet grip. The LazerGrip lets you become one with the road. With ActiveComfort, the GP 5000 TL absorbs vibrations and provides an outstanding driving experience. The VectranBreaker is made of a high-tech fibre and now offers even better puncture protection. The user-friendly tubeless systemThe TL technology is specially designed to adapt tubeless to the demands of racing cycling. Easy to assemble and reliable in use. Continental recommends the use of Continental RevoSealant sealant.Black Chili - The mixture makes the differenceThe developers at Continental have revolutionized the cycling scene with the unique tread compound, which is manufactured only in Germany. With the legendary BlackChili Compound, the eternal question of whether grip or rolling resistance could be answered sustainably could be answered. The regular test wins prove the measurable and perceptible advantages for the drivers in the laboratory and on the road. The latest polymers and specially developed soot particles and fillers guarantee a unique performance.Lazer Grip Makes you one with the road. The lasered micro tread pattern focuses on the shoulder area of the tyre for increased cornering grip.Active Comfort TechnologyThe revolutionary approach to road cycling. Integrated into the tyre construction, Active Comfort technology absorbs shocks and provides a superior riding experience.Vectran BreakerA synthetically produced high-tech fibre, even more tear-resistant with the lowest weight. The reference in puncture protection, now even stronger and more puncture-proof.Details

productList.title: SCHWALBE G-ONE Allround Bike Tyre 28", TubelessEasy Evolution, foldable black (2019)
productList.description: For the new trend of gravel-bikes Schwalbe offers the right tire with the One family. With its light rolling G-One profile and the Tubeless Tire Technology it is pure fun flying over field and forest roads. This revolutionary new construction enables Tubeless Easy for high pressure tires. Tubeless tires for road bikes are now getting noticeable lighter and also substantially faster. The integrated MicroSkin tissue copes with several tasks at the same time: It helps seal the tire air tight. It guaranties the reliable high pressure stability. And it improves the cut resistance.Details

productList.title: Continental GrandPrix 5000 Bike Tyre 650 x 28B black (2019)
productList.description: How to do something even better: the Grand Prix 5000 from ContinentalContinental was faced with the difficult task of developing a worthy successor for the Grand Prix 4000 S II - for the tire that continues to dominate the performance tests. The challenge was to top it off with rolling resistance, high mileage, speed and puncture protection. It was necessary to top it all off with rolling resistance, high mileage, speed and puncture protection.The developers at Continental have put one special person at the center of these considerations - you. It is simply your time that you spend on the bike. Whether it's for training or competition. Be it in the rain or in the sun, cold or warm. Be it to set a new best time or simply to switch off on the house round.The best all-rounder in the field on a completely new performance level. Drive faster, more comfortably and even more puncture-proof. Made to make you better. The Grand Prix features an advanced BlackChili compound for lowest rolling resistance, high mileage and maximum wet grip. The LazerGrip lets you become one with the road. With ActiveComfort, the GP 5000 absorbs shocks and provides a superior driving experience. The VectranBreaker is made of a high-tech fibre and now offers even better puncture protection.Black Chili - The mixture makes the differenceThe developers at Continental have revolutionized the cycling scene with the unique tread compound, which is manufactured only in Germany. With the legendary BlackChili Compound, the eternal question of whether grip or rolling resistance could be answered sustainably could be answered. The regular test wins prove the measurable and perceptible advantages for the drivers in the laboratory and on the road. The latest polymers and specially developed soot particles and fillers guarantee a unique performance.Lazer Grip Makes you one with the road. productList.title: SCHWALBE ONE Bike Tyre Evo V-Guard 28" folding white/black (2019)
productList.description: The name alone shows the significance of this tyre for Schwalbe. With its new tread design, improved compound and high-quality workmanship, the Schwalbe One sets standards in quality and performance. Originally developed for competitive sports, Schwalbe has made the top tyres wheelchair-compatible with the WheelStarCompund. The Schwalbe One is fast and reliable at the same time. The V-Guard, made of special fabric, which is characterised by low weight and extreme cut resistance, provides puncture protection.  TRIPLE COMPOUNDThe best and most complex rubber compounds are triple compounds. The rubber compound is perfectly matched to the application. MTB (PaceStar, TrailStar, VertStar, GateStar), road bike (OneStar), tour (TravelStar), wheelchair (WheelStar). productList.title: Shimano PD-M520 Pedals SPD black (2019)
productList.description: A functional SPD pedal for those who want to maintain control of the bike and get the full effect of each turn of the pedals.Details

productList.title: Shimano Deore XT PD-M8000 Pedals black (2019)
productList.description: Shimano's new XT pedals with higher efficiencyShimano's new Shimano Deore XT PD-M8000 pedals in black ensure an optimisation between the interface rider and bike. This is ensured by the now legendary SPD technology. Compared to its predecessors, the footprint of the XT PD-M8000 has been widened by 2.8 mm and the platform lowered by 0.5 mm. This increases the efficiency of the pedals noticeably and they are particularly suitable for use in the MTB Cross Country or Cross Country Race.The pedals come with the SM-SH51 Cleats as usual from Shimano. The pedal body is made of anodised aluminum and the pedal axle of CrMo. The compact bearing is of course sealed. Matching shoe plates are included in the scope of delivery. Also in the new edition, the XT click pedals are reliable and almost indestructible classics for dedicated mountain bikers and, as usual from Shimano, slightly better than their predecessors.Details

productList.title: Look Kéo 2 Max Pedals black (2019)
productList.description: The new Keo 2 Max is the product that will give you the confidence you need to go beyond your personal limits. The Look design team has completely remodeled the shape of the Keo 2 Max, giving it a new, slimmed down line yet a wider contact surface, increasing its style and efficiency.Details

productList.title: Look Kéo 2 Max Pedals Vämser Edition black
productList.description: For even more powerful and comfortable pedalling, the contact area of the Keo 2 Max Carbon has been increased by 12% compared to the Keo Carbon. In order to further optimise power transmission and the life of the pedal, this surface is made of stainless steel and is shaped into the pedal body.LightweightAt only 130 g, the Keo 2 Max is one of the lightest pedals in its category. This is due to the use of composites that allow weight savings without affecting resistance.ReliabilityParticular attention has been paid to reliability: Composite body, INOX contact surface, oversize axle and double density make this pedal a particularly safe and durable product.Thanks to the new axle design of the Keo 2 Max, the contact height can be maintained while using an oversize titanium axle. It consists of 2 miniature ball bearings (12 mm inside x 18 mm outside) and a needle bearing. LOOK axles are only released after a rotational test of 1 million cycles at 100 rpm with a load of 90 kg on the centre of the pedal and an eccentric rotation (one shock at each revolution). This test exceeds the highest applicable standard in this area: EN standard EN14781.A double seal guarantees a particularly long service life of the bearings.Setting the Q-factorThanks to its 14 mm long thread, the new LOOK axis allows the Q-factor to be set to 2 mm with the aid of a specific spacer, which is available as an individual part. This allows a change from 53 to 55 mm.Details

productList.title: Reverse Escape Pedals blue (2019)
productList.description: A solid and safe position on the pedal is just as important as the traction between tyre and ground. With the Reverse Escape Pedal this critical contact point is injected with a shot of style. The platform area of the Escape is generously designed and offers optimal support even for riders with larger feet. Other advantages of this pedal include its interchangeable pins and the "anti rotate-function" which protects against unwanted pedal spinning. Reverse Components offer the Escape Pedal in different colours so you can choose the right hue for you and your bike.Details

productList.title: Race Face Atlas Pedals orange (2019)
productList.description: Race Face components are the result of Race Face's efforts to produce the most stable, lightest and best-looking bicycle components in the world. Their motto "Inspired by Riders" shows how much Race Face loves biking itself. Through over 15 years of experience, Race Face have learned exactly what they like, as well as becoming experts in the field of developing precision components. Driven by the desire to leave the competition in the dust, Race Face’s engineers employ a completely uncompromising attitude to product design, whatever the discipline is.  Equally at home on and off road, for cross country or for huge jumps, the Race Face range combines superior technology with innovative concepts and the famous Race Face aesthetic.  Race Face designers are constantly working to find the highest quality materials to create innovative technical products that will allow you to fully experience and enjoy your bike adventures. The designers always bear in mind the most important contact points between rider and bike: the buttocks, the feet and of course the hands. Race Face products are designed especially for you, the biker. Details

productList.title: Garmin Vector 3 Pedals With two sensors black (2019)
productList.description: Better performanceBetter, smarter and connected on the go - with the Vector 3-Watt Pedal System. If you want to beat your personal best in your next competition or Gran Fondo, past performance data is always the most reliable way to estimate your future performance. Unlike other power meters, the Vector 3's sensors are located directly in the pedals, so you get reliable data every time you train.Better training planning with Cycling DynamicsWith the Vector 3 system with dual sensor, the performance of the right and left leg is stored independently of each other. The Vector 3 measures overall performance, cadence and power distribution from left and right. It also records advanced Cycling Dynamics so you can adapt your workout to your personal weaknesses and strengths to improve your performance. The device also stores when and how long you have spent standing or sitting. This allows conclusions to be drawn about the effectiveness of the respective position. You can also see the power phase, which shows you when the positive riding force begins and ends in the pedal cycle. The Platform Center Offset indicates where the force is applied to the pedal so you can be sure that the cleat is positioned correctly. Edge Bicycle Computer and Garmin Connect Mobile App.Easy to assemble, change and use  With the Vector 3, you don't have to disassemble or reassemble any other components and save yourself the trouble of installing additional sensors. Therefore the Vector 3 is installed like any other pedal. Mounting on different bicycles is also very simple. Ergonomics were also carefully considered during the development with a beautifully shaped design. The precision stainless steel axle and composite pedal body are specially manufactured and tested for durability. The device has a battery life of up to 120 hours.Connected BikeYour workouts will be even more effective if you pair the Vector 3 with compatible Edge bike computers, ANT+ or Bluetooth enabled fitness devices, including compatible Forerunner and fēnix devices, and the Garmin Connect Mobile app. These devices also enable trouble-free software updates. After the training Garmin Connect, Strava and TrainingPeaks come into play. There you can analyse your data, share it with others, view it on a map, plan routes and more. Use ANT+ connectivity to get better results by pairing the Vector 3 with TrainerRoad. The TrainerRoad app provides individually adapted indoor training based on performance data from Vector 3. The indoor training system also has training plans with precise instructions on how to achieve your specific fitness and competition goals. This is what structured training looks like in its best form.Details

productList.title: HT Enduro Race T1 Ti Pedals black (2019)
productList.description: With the Enduro Race T1 pedals, HT-Components has also declared war with big names like Shimano and Crank Brothers in the trail and enduro segment. Used by enduro professionals like Jerome Clementz and Jared Graves, the Enduro Race T1 proves with their placings that the HT clipless pedals with their flat design and compact aluminium platform can do more than just look good.  The CNC-machined pedal uses its own clipless pedal mechanism with its own (supplied) cleats. Spring tension is finely adjustable and platform has additional pins unique in this class to provide maximum control when clicked in or out. The Ti version with titanium pedal axle at a lightweight 328 grams marks the top of the Enduro Race T1 pedals from HT. Details
